00034 #define POSdouble(ix,iy,iz) (((ix)*(ny) + (iy)) * (2*((nz)/2+1)) + (iz)) 
00035 #define ACC_R(ix,iy,iz) (((ix)*(ny) + (iy)) * ((nz) + (iz)))
00036 #define ACC_C(ix,iy,iz) (((ix)*(ny) + (iy)) * (((nz)/2+1) + (iz)))

00039 //#define ACC_C(ix,iy,iz) (((ix)*(ny) + (iy)) * ((nz)/2+1) + (iz))

00041 #define c_re(c) ((c)[0])
00042 #define c_im(c) ((c)[1])

00048 #ifdef GAUSSIAN_KERNEL
00049 #warning "FYI: Enabling Gaussian Kernel in PoissonSolver"
00050 #else
00051 #warning "FYI: Enabling Top Hat Kernel in PoissonSolver"
00052 #endif
00053 
00054 template < int nstencil >
00055 class PoissonSolver {
00056  protected:
00057   ScalarField *m_prho;
00058 
00059  public:
00060   PoissonSolver( ScalarField *prho )
00061     : m_prho( prho ) { }
00062 
00063     inline double Gauss3D( const double &k, const double &sigma ) {
00064       double v = 1.0 / ( pow( sigma * sigma * 2.0 * M_PI, 1.5 ) );
00065       v *= exp( -0.5 * k * k / ( sigma * sigma ) );
00066       return v;
00067     }
00068 
00069     inline double TopHat3D( const double &k, const double &R ) {
00070       if ( k <= R ) {
00071     double norm = 4.0 / 3.0 * M_PI * R * R * R;
00072     return 1.0 / norm;
00073       }
00074       return 0.0;
00075     }
00076 
00077 
00078 
00079     void solve( ScalarField *pphi, double Boxlength, double sigma ) {
00080       int nx = m_prho->get_xsize();
00081       int ny = m_prho->get_ysize();
00082       int nz = m_prho->get_zsize(); 
00083 
00084       GreensFunction<nstencil> gf( 2.0 * M_PI / ( double ) m_prho->get_ysize() );
00085 
00086 
00087       double *data = new double[ nx * ny * nz ];
00088       double *kern = new double[ nx * ny * nz ];
00089 
00090 
00091       // copy data without ghost cells to array data for FFTW
00092       for ( int ix = 0; ix < nx; ++ix )
00093     for ( int iy = 0; iy < ny; ++iy )
00094       for ( int iz = 0; iz < nz; ++iz ) {
00095 
00096         int iix( ix ), iiy( iy ), iiz( iz );
00097 
00098         if ( iix > nx / 2 )
00099           iix -= nx;
00100         if ( iiy > ny / 2 )
00101           iiy -= ny;
00102         if ( iiz > nz / 2 )
00103           iiz -= nz;
00104 
00105         double k = sqrt( iix * iix + iiy * iiy + iiz * iiz );
00106 
00107 
00108 
00109 #ifdef TOPHAT_KERNEL
00110         kern[ ACC_R( ix, iy, iz ) ] = TopHat3D( k, sigma );
00111 #else
00112         kern[ ACC_R( ix, iy, iz ) ] = Gauss3D( k, sigma );
00113                         
00114 #endif
00115         data[ ACC_R( ix, iy, iz ) ] = ( double ) ( *m_prho ) ( ix, iy, iz );
00116       }
00117 
00118       fftw_complex *cdata = new fftw_complex[ nx * ny * ( nz / 2 + 1 ) ];
00119       //fftw_plan plan  = rfftw3d_create_plan( nx, ny, nz,
00120       //                 FFTW_REAL_TO_COMPLEX,
00121       //                 FFTW_ESTIMATE ); 
00122       //rfftwnd_one_real_to_complex( plan, &data[ 0 ], &cdata[ 0 ] );
00123       fftw_plan plan = fftw_plan_dft_r2c_3d( nx, ny, nz,
00124                          &data[0], &cdata[0],
00125                          FFTW_ESTIMATE);
00126       fftw_execute( plan );
00127       fftw_destroy_plan( plan ); // FFTW3 uses one method to destroy all different plans!
00128       std::cout << c_re(cdata[0]) << std::endl;
00129     
00130       fftw_complex *ckern = new fftw_complex[ nx * ny * ( nz / 2 + 1 ) ];
00131       //fftw_plan kplan = rfftw3d_create_plan( nx, ny, nz,
00132       //                 FFTW_REAL_TO_COMPLEX,
00133       //                 FFTW_ESTIMATE );
00134       //rfftwnd_one_real_to_complex( kplan, &kern[ 0 ], &ckern[ 0 ] );
00135       fftw_plan kplan = fftw_plan_dft_r2c_3d( nx, ny, nz,
00136                           &kern[0], &ckern[0],
00137                           FFTW_ESTIMATE);
00138       fftw_execute( kplan );
00139       fftw_destroy_plan( kplan );    
00140 
00141       double Omegam0 = 0.25;
00142       double a = 1.0;
00143 
00144       double fftnorm = 1.0 / ( nx * ny * nz );
00145       double mGpi = -1.5 * Omegam0 / a * fftnorm;
00146 
00147       for ( int ix = 0; ix < nx; ++ix )
00148     for ( int iy = 0; iy < ny; ++iy )
00149       for ( int iz = 0; iz < ( nz / 2 + 1 ); ++iz ) {
00150 
00151         int iix( ix ), iiy( iy ), iiz( iz );
00152 
00153         if ( iix > nx / 2 )
00154           iix -= nx;
00155         if ( iiy > ny / 2 )
00156           iiy -= ny;
00157 
00158         double fac = mGpi / ( gf.apply( iix ) + gf.apply( iiy ) + gf.apply( iiz ) );
00159 
00160         double dre = c_re(cdata[ ACC_C( ix, iy, iz ) ]); 
00161         double dim = c_im(cdata[ ACC_C( ix, iy, iz ) ]);
00162 
00163 
00164 #if 0
00165         //c_re(ckern[ijk]) = dre*fftnorm;
00166         //c_im(ckern[ijk]) = dim*fftnorm;
00167 
00168         //c_re(cdata[ijk]) *= fac;
00169         //c_im(cdata[ijk]) *= fac;
00170 
00171         c_re(ckern[ ix ][ iy ][ iz ]) = dre * fftnorm;
00172         c_im(ckern[ ix ][ iy ][ iz ]) = dim * fftnorm;
00173 
00174         //std::cerr << c_re(cdata[ix][iy][iz]) << ", ";
00175 
00176         c_re(cdata[ ix ][ iy ][ iz ]) *= fac;
00177         c_im(cdata[ ix ][ iy ][ iz ]) *= fac;
00178 
00179 #else
00180         double kre = c_re(ckern[ ACC_C( ix, iy, iz ) ]);
00181         double kim = c_im(ckern[ ACC_C( ix, iy, iz ) ]); 
00182 
00183         c_re(ckern[ ACC_C( ix, iy, iz ) ]) = ( dre * kre - dim * kim ) * fftnorm;
00184         c_im(ckern[ ACC_C( ix, iy, iz ) ]) = ( dre * kim + dim * kre ) * fftnorm;
00185 
00186         c_re(cdata[ ACC_C( ix, iy, iz ) ]) = ( dre * kre - dim * kim ) * fac;
00187         c_im(cdata[ ACC_C( ix, iy, iz ) ]) = ( dre * kim + dim * kre ) * fac;
00188 
00189 #endif
00190 
00191       }
00192 
00193       c_re(cdata[ 0 ]) = 0.0;
00194       c_im(cdata[ 0 ]) = 0.0;
00195 
00196       //fftw_plan iplan = rfftw3d_create_plan( nx, ny, nz,
00197       //                 FFTW_COMPLEX_TO_REAL,
00198       //                 FFTW_ESTIMATE ); 
00199       //rfftwnd_one_complex_to_real( iplan, &cdata[ 0 ], &data[ 0 ] );
00200       fftw_plan iplan = fftw_plan_dft_c2r_3d( nx, ny, nz,
00201                           &cdata[0], &data[0],
00202                           FFTW_ESTIMATE );
00203       fftw_execute( iplan );
00204       fftw_destroy_plan( iplan ); // FFTW3 uses one method to destroy all different plans!
00205       delete[] cdata;
00206 
00207       //fftw_plan ikplan = rfftw3d_create_plan( nx, ny, nz,
00208       //                 FFTW_COMPLEX_TO_REAL,
00209       //                 FFTW_ESTIMATE );
00210       //rfftwnd_one_complex_to_real( ikplan, &ckern[ 0 ], &kern[ 0 ] );
00211       fftw_plan ikplan = fftw_plan_dft_c2r_3d( nx, ny, nz,
00212                            &ckern[0], &kern[0],
00213                            FFTW_ESTIMATE );
00214       fftw_execute( ikplan );
00215       fftw_destroy_plan( ikplan );
00216       delete[] ckern;
00217 
00218       for ( int ix = 0; ix < nx; ++ix )
00219     for ( int iy = 0; iy < ny; ++iy )
00220       for ( int iz = 0; iz < nz; ++iz )
00221         ( *m_prho ) ( ix, iy, iz ) = kern[ ACC_R( ix, iy, iz ) ]; //kern[ix][iy][iz];
00222 
00223       delete[] kern;
00224 
00225       // recreate pphi to ensure correct size
00226       pphi->recreate( nx, ny, nz, m_prho->get_dx(), m_prho->get_stencil() );
00227 
00228       // copy data to obey ghost cell structure
00229       for ( int ix = 0; ix < nx; ++ix )
00230     for ( int iy = 0; iy < ny; ++iy )
00231       for ( int iz = 0; iz < nz; ++iz ) {
00232         ( *pphi ) ( ix, iy, iz ) = data[ ACC_R( ix, iy, iz ) ]; //data[ix][iy][iz];//data[(ix*ny + iy) * (2*(nz/2+1)) + iz];
00233       }
00234 
00235       delete[] data;
00236 
00237     }
00238 
00239 };

00241 
00242 #endif
